ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Savawulf's Ransom
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok Savawulf, I m a little confused here and I apologize. The first thing I want to get cleared up is, are there any legal ramifications in the real world that
ygData.messageBody:
Ok Savawulf, I'm a little confused here and I apologize. The first thing
I want to get cleared up is, are there any legal ramifications in the
real world that any of us whom may decide to assist you in this "quest"
can get into? I mean no insult by this question; just want to clear up
any confusion.
Second, do I understand correctly that this is a harmless role-playing
game you two are doing and you would basically like some others to join
you or "play along" so to speak? If so hey I'm cool with that.
Third, got a pic of this evil dark elf? One can't very well go around
hacking every female dark elf they see. That would be like someone
running around saying that this watery tart threw him a sword and now he
is king that would be absurd!

Oh and off topic, Dude! Your outfit rocks!

-----Original Message-----
Message: 1
Date: Fri, 16 Aug 2002 02:28:39 -0400
From: "WULF Tech" <wulftech@...>
Subject: Savawulf's Ransom

Here's the scoop:

Among my many characters I play a half-elf ranger named Savawulf on the
Cazic Thule server. Savawulf is a member of the Draconis Rampant guild.
Recently some events have come to pass where Savawulf was wronged by
another member of the DR guild. An evil dark elf necromancer named
Kethryveris Ashkeveron. Watch out for her if you ever meet her. She's
very evil and cannot be trusted!!!

The story is thatSavawulf had a very valuable item stolen from him in
real life - out of game that is. Now, the person behind the evil dark
elf lady is holding this item for ransom. Seeing that I have no
reprieve, I feel it is in my best interest for the safety of this item
to be returned that I just comply with her wishes. Therefore, For the
full story, plese go to the following website:

http://www.geocities.com/savawulf

You can find the details there. Incidentally, I also cross posted this
to the Draconis Rampant message board, and curiously enough, the
Savatage fan page messageboard.

I'm afraid to see what kind of responses I get. I'll probably end up
getting sued by the band for copying their song without permission, but
that's a chance I'm going to have to take if I am to get this very
valuable item back.


If this hsan't piqued your curiosity enough, I don't know what will.

Check out the page.

Respectfully,
Savawulf Tageric
15th Season HEF RNG
Cazic thule server
